text: Egh kamaghɨn a uabɨ uan ziam fan kogh, egh Israelian igharaz darazi abɨnan kogham. Egh a Godɨn Akar Gavgaviba ategh ighuigh agharir guvim o agharir kɨriamɨn mangan markɨ. A kamaghɨn damu azenir avɨribar atrivimɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ gɨn an ovavir boriba an danganim inigh atirivibar otiv mangɨvɨra ikiam.”
